rows.label: bf04390100_0020
rows.name: You need to learn when to quit!

rows.label: bf04390100_0040
rows.name:
You used Grampypon's research
for evil long enough!

rows.label: bf04390100_0050
rows.name: I-if I do that, I'll suffer huge losses!

rows.label: bf04390100_0060
rows.name: I've invested a lot in this project!

rows.label: bf04390100_0070
rows.name:
Oh, okay. We'll just hand you over
to the Imperial Army, then.

rows.label: bf04390100_0080
rows.name:
They'll be really interested in
all the stuff you had Kiku doing.

rows.label: bf04390100_0090
rows.name:
You've probably been doing
plenty of other bad things, haven't you?

rows.label: bf04390100_0105
rows.name:
I never had you down as
such a conniving boy.

rows.label: bf04390100_0120
rows.name:
All right.
I stop production of artificial Blades.

rows.label: bf04390100_0130
rows.name:
That Nopon is still of use to us...
Do you really have to interfere?
